products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: E | ADMIN BUILDING > E1 | HYDRANT SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint. Pipe joints shall be of grooved with groove coupling. all escavation & back filling, pedestal support, structural support shall be of vendor's scope. 100 mm NB
products_entries.feature_or_specifications: material: ms(black steel), grade: heavy, thickness: 5.4mm, standard: indian standard 1239 part -1, fittings: elbows, tees, flanges, reduces clamps, ms support dash fasteners, painting: two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint, joint type: grooved with groove coupling, scope: all excavation & back filling, pedestal support, structural support by vendor

products_entries.section_context_for_this_product_block: E | ADMIN BUILDING > E2 | AUTOMATIC SPRINKLER SYSTEM
products_entries.full_product_description: Supply, erection, fabrication, testing of MS black steel pipe Heavy grade of thickness 5.4mm conforming to IS : 1239 Part -1 including all fittings viz. Elbows, tees, flanges, etc. reduces clamps, MS support dash fasteners etc. including painting the pipe with two coats of approved primer and two coats of approved paint. Pipe joints shall be of grooved with groove couplings. All related civil work viz as wall cutting, structural supports etc for laying of sprinkler piping shall be vendor's scope. 40 mm NB
